description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any active player (listed on the official game-day roster) or the head coach of either the New England Patriots or the Seattle Seahawks is shown crying during the live broadcast of the United States National Anthem at Super Bowl LX. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

For the purposes of this market, “crying” is defined as the clear and visible shedding of tears during the performance of the United States National Anthem. Any player or head coach shown crying before or after the National Anthem will not be considered.

If, for any reason, the United States National Anthem performance is not shown on the NBC official broadcast, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If Super Bowl LX is cancelled or postponed after February 22, 2026, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official broadcast of Super Bowl LX.

events.title: Big Game: Player/HC to cry during National Anthem?
